column6: One of my favorite brands of lipsticks

column14: Revlon Rum Raisin has  been one of my favorites because you can wear with many colors of clothes. And it stays on longer it’s creamy and doesn’t run

column6: Revlon is great for any lipstick junkie
column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2015
column14: Revlon hands down makes one of the best and affordable drugstore lipsticks available. I have yet to find a lipstick that isn't a stain have the awesome stay power this brand has. This color is a beautiful raspberry color. Perfect to complete most winter and fall makeup looks. The formula is creamy and smooth. The product has a very satin finish. One issue I have is if I forget to exfoliate before applying it can lead to bleeding without liner and can sink into your lip creases. But that's pretty much true for any highly pigmented, cream formulas. Absolutely love Revlon lipsticks. Highly recommend.

column14: Very moist,  rich color, great price.
